Articles.Content:
Hi,

I know this is probably an easy question to answer but I recently returned to playing ksp and cannot find a way to download 0.23.5 ARM. My store account only shows 0.23 as available and I can't find it anywhere on the forum or online. Can someone please help?

Thanks, Nick.
Your store account should be where it is downloaded from. Also, if you already have KSP you can run the launcher and it will update.

ARM is actually built into 0.23.5 so just download that and you're go for launch

The buildID.txt in the zip will say it's build 464, that's how you'll know it's the latest release.
